about.experience: experience that takes you in a retrospect of the most precious memories the
about.savannah: had over the last 4 years in Savannah, GA.

howTo.prompt: which map are you interacting with today?

interactiveSteps.instructionOne: 1. head to the closest pin-point in the map.
interactiveSteps.instructionTwo: 2. once within 50 meters, press the icon on top of the pin.

staticSteps.instructionOne: 1. select the point you would like to try.

errorModal.message: Go close 50 meters to any of the pointers.
